Hotel Bellevue

From the outside, the Bellevue hotel is minimalistic, boasting sleek designs with white hues. From the inside, the hotel opens to a large and lavishly decorated atrium, exuding a unique airiness and comfort

. The soft daylight blends perfectly with the natural tones of the meticulously designed furniture and lighting, making Hotel Bellevue an excellent choice for relaxation and regenerating the energy of life.At the end of the 19th-century, Čikat was recognised as a “healing location” due to its specific microclimate, making it especially popular among the Viennese aristocracy

. Today, this noble tradition continues with the Spa Clinic and Spa Garden and their superior wellness offer.Fine cuisine can be both a remedy and a gourmet delight, especially if the ingredients are fresh, locally-sourced, and of first-class quality. Our chefs at Bellevue pick the herbs and spices from the hotel's herb garden, after all

.And if you’re looking to combine business with pleasure, there are two small and one large conference hall (360 seats) at your disposal for business lunches.WHY CHOOSE HOTEL BELLEVUE?suites with a terrace hot tub

award-winning Bellevue Spa Clinic
personalized spa treatments and programs
Spa Garden
indoor and outdoor seawater pool
managed beach
Japanese restaurant Matsunoki awarded with Michelin Plate
modern congress hall
Kids Club

One of the secrets to the islander's longevity is the critical nap following lunch, after which you can enjoy the hotel's exterior or interior pools or the hotel beach to surrender your body to the healing effects of the sea

. A walk through the hotel park and along the coastal promenade, where you can breathe in the fragrances of sap and algae under the shade of the ancient pines, is the perfect way to enjoy the picturesque views from the Bellevue

.Filled with the intense fragrances of Mediterranean herbs, the fresh sea air is an excellent introduction to the Spa Garden where you can relax in the jacuzzi and enjoy the benefits of a garden massage

. Your revitalisation can continue in the Spa Clinic zone which offers a complete wellness ecosystem promising transformational results with a glamorous twist, integrating the very best in high-tech, cutting-edge therapies and classic wellness treatments with a focus on detoxifying and reenergising

.For 140 years, the people of Lošinj have never said goodbye to their guests, but rather “until we meet again” - and after revitalising your health, your energy and your spirit, we ensure that a return to our magical sanctuary amongst the sea and the pines is inevitable.

Art in the Atrium – Libar Gallery Exhibition
Galerija Libar, located in the exclusive setting of the hotel, offers an overview of contemporary Croatian art from 1960 to the present. Through the works of renowned artists, visitors have the opportunity to experience the richness and vitality of the national art scene.

[Learn more](/en/news/art-in-the-atrium-libar-gallery-exhibition/)
Highlights
Croatia's Best Hotel Spa 2025
The Spa Clinic of Hotel Bellevue - the world-class resort’s lifestyle spa has been named Croatia’s Best Hotel Spa in 2025![read more](/en/news/losinj-hotels-and-villas-celebrates-double-win-at-2025-world-spa-awards/)
Your fairytale wedding on Lošinj

Your fairytale wedding on Lošinj

Boutique Hotel Alhambra

At Čikat Bay where the sea is emerald green and the smell of ancient pines is intoxicating, lies the luxurious Boutique Hotel Alhambra & Villa Augusta, members of Virtuoso and the prestigious Small Luxury Hotels of the World

.The hotel and villa harmoniously blend the historic charm of sophisticated Art Nouveau architecture with contemporary design into a unique space that exudes warmth and discreet luxury. Surrounded by a meticulously designed park, each detail, from the rooms to the beach, has been crafted to provide guests with maximum comfort and ultimate pleasure

.Foodies will find their piece of heaven in the world-class Alfred Keller Restaurant, awarded one Michelin star and featured in the renowned Gault Millau guide. The ever-changing menu embraces sustainable sourcing and local food movement where the finest Croatian produce, fish and meat take center stage

. Because a meal is best paired with a bottle of wine, Alfred Keller's rich wine cellar has more than 610 top quality labels for you to enjoy.WHY CHOOSE BOUTIQUE HOTEL ALHAMBRA?luxurious rooms and suites with breathtaking views

fine dining, local ingredients, top chef
Michelin star restaurant Alfred Keller
Cube Spa Alhambra
possibility to rent the entire Villa Augusta

Alhambra Hotel, with the accompanying Villa Augusta, has provided its guests with a unique experience of complete “body and mind” relaxation for over a hundred years. You can, therefore, relax, enjoy and let the trusted staff of Alhambra take care of you

.You can find everything you need at our concièrge, from organised transfers and luxury car and boat rentals to tailor-made trips and personalised experiences. We even offer a wide range of services at the Alhambra Spa zone (a seawater pool, Finnish and Turkish saunas, fitness studio, yoga, massages and beauty treatments)

.If you’re looking for leisure in nature, you can always walk down to the beach below the hotel, jump into the sea, and enjoy being cured by our waters. We will always have a place for you to lie on our sun deck, known as the best way to soak up the energy of the sun. And lucky for you, the sun's rays never stop shining on the island of Lošinj

. And lucky for you, the sun's rays never stop shining on the island of Lošinj.If you’re planning on organising a wedding or spending your honeymoon in a sanctuary of serenity, look no further - the sunset at the Čikat bay is one of the most romantic in the world. To make the experience complete, you can rent the entire Villa Augusta for you and your friends
. Remember, discretion is a part of Lošinj’s mentality.

Michelin-starred restaurant

Our signature fine dining restaurant Alfred Keller, awarded one Michelin star and 16.5 Gault&Millau points, takes a thoughtful approach to a great restaurant experience where Croatia's finest produce, fish and meat take center stage under the creative vision of chef Michael Gollenz.Wine cellarOur wine cellar carries over 550 white and red labels of superb quality from around the world
. Some of them will be new discoveries while others are well-known classics including rare Croatian wines.

Art collection by Alhambra - Josip Konta
We are pleased to present an art exhibition in the Boutique Hotel Alhambra gallery, an exhibition of sculptor Josip Konta (b. 1946) with the possibility of purchasing art.

Villa Hortensia

This beautiful villa is located at the Čikat Bay of Lošinj, widely known for its healing air and lush, fragrant vegetation. The villa has been completely renovated and is equipped with the latest luxury amenities. Everything here is tailored to your desires.The villa is surrounded by a beautiful garden hidden from the view of a heated outdoor seawater pool and an outdoor massage area

. Take advantage of the private beach located directly in front of the villa so you can delight in the sea and the sun.The lavish rooms are designed as an integral area with a bathroom and a terrace overlooking the sea and the bay. For cozy gatherings, there are communal rooms such as a dining room with a terrace and a spacious living room with a bar

. You can even convert the living room into a meeting room so you can fulfill your business obligations in a wonderful laid-back environment.Unwind and rejuvenate at the Wellness & Beauty area with Finnish saunas and Kneipp fitness or take advantage of the unique Spa Clinic at the nearby Bellevue hotel

.A private chef and butler are at your service whenever you’d like, and our staff will fulfill all of your desires; from preparing top-quality specialties of your choice, to private excursions and trips, and VIP transportation with a luxury car and speedboat

.If you wish to feel at ease in a fresh and natural environment and escape into a private retreat with a loved one, Villa Hortensia is just the right choice for you. The villa is also a splendid choice for weddings, small celebrations and business meetings.Villa Hortensia features:10 suites on three floors accommodating up to 20 people with 3 extra beds for children

landscaped garden with heated outdoor seawater pool and massage area
private beach with deck chairs and parasols, shower and changing areas
Wellness & Beauty zone with Finnish sauna, relaxation area, Kneipp, jacuzzi and fitness room
gated with 24-hour security video surveillance
24-hour chef and an International Butler Academy certified butler service on request

Villa Mirasol

In the unique Čikat Bay lies Villa Mirasol, an exquisite example of the charming, sophisticated Art Nouveau style. Completely restored and decorated to the highest standards, Villa Mirasol will enchant you with its appearance and offer.The villa is surrounded by two terraces overlooking the Čikat Bay and boasts a carefully decorated, spacious and fragrant garden with a jacuzzi

. Directly in front of the villa, you will find a fraction of the coast reserved just for you - a beach perfect for guests looking to unwind and enjoy the beneficial effects of Lošinj's air, sea and nature.The airy and luxurious interior of the villa is dominated by designer furniture aligned with impressive marble and wooden surfaces

. If you’re looking for additional entertainment, the villa also offers a private cinema hall, a pool table, a library and a wellness area with saunas. For moments of complete leisure, you can revel in spa treatments at the nearby boutique hotel Alhambra.Villa Mirasol is rented out as a separate facility and, whenever you’d like, is available with a private chef and butler

.If you’re looking to feel at ease in the peace and privacy of a luxurious ambience, Villa Mirasol is the perfect choice for you. You can enjoy our private excursions and relish in the dishes prepared according to your wishes - and if you are on holiday and have business commitments, there is no better place to take care of them than in this divine environment
.Villa Mirasol features:5 suites on three floors plus an adjacent 3-bedroom apartment with a separate entrance, accommodating up to 16 guests

expansive terraces overlooking Čikat Bay
luxurious interiors feature designer furniture, Murano glass and marble
private wellness with gym and saunas
outdoor swimming pool, jacuzzi and sunbathing area
private home cinema and library
gated with 24-hour security video surveillance
24-hour chef and an International Butler Academy certified butler service on request

Captain's Villa Rouge

Secluded Villa in Mediterranean Garden Delve into Lošinj’s Austrian history with a stay in this seven-suite villa, designed by the renowned Viennese architect Friedrich Sigmund. Preserved in its original form, replete with an alluring garden, the beautifully restored residence features a wraparound terrace, shaded by fruit-bearing lemon trees. An ample pool invites amongst the greenery

. An ample pool invites amongst the greenery.Sup from a private chef-prepared epicurean feast - cooked before your eyes in the outdoor kitchen, dance across the vintage-patterned terrazzo floor beneath the bedazzling light cast by colourful Murano glass chandeliers and be wowed by the glass-walled dining room, an ultra-chic hideout, surrounded by emerald pine expanses and vistas of turquoise seas

.Marine buffs will enjoy The Captain Master Bedroom, which showcases the villa’s rich naval history via various seafarers’ design elements, including gemstone-dressed bathrooms that hint at treasures found and the impact that naval voyages had on the island.Villa Rouge features:7 suites on three floors with separate entrances, kitchen, dining and living rooms on each floor

opulent and exquisite interiors featuring impressive marble and wooden surfaces
splendid Mediterranean garden with expansive terraces overlooking the Čikat Bay
heated outdoor pool with sun beds and patio umbrellas and jacuzzi
outdoor dining area with a barbecue
private spa with steam and sauna rooms
gated with 24-hour security video surveillance

gated with 24-hour security video surveillance
24-hour chef and an International Butler Academy certified butler service on request
exclusive rental or by floor

Villa Hygeia

The Belle Époque Family Summer House Epitomising the artistic elements that define the period known as the Belle Epoque, emanating joie d’ vivre, this lovely villa once shone as the home of a wealthy, local shipbuilding family.With five suites capable of accommodating ten guests, the spacious haven oozes glamour and romance

. Purple wisteria spill down a trellis on the terrace, the sea, close enough to touch, gleams and sparkles in myriad blue hues, and the breeze wafts both the healing scent of island plants and briny sea air. Prussian blue, stylish interiors coordinate with the sea’s cobalt tones, providing a sense of place.Consider the charming attic-sited Master bedroom as your own oasis

.Consider the charming attic-sited Master bedroom as your own oasis. Its beamed ceiling and white wooden panelling conjure the atmosphere of a vintage sailboat cabin.Thoroughly modern, though historic in appearance, this restored villa vaunts an open-space living room, an eye-popping wine cellar - even a cinema room
.Villa Hygeia features:exclusive luxury seaside villa overlooking picturesque Čikat Bay

5 comfortable suites out of which 2 beautifully appointed kids' rooms, accommodating up to 10 guests
expansive landscaped garden and outdoor living space
spacious terraces with spectacular sea views
private home cinema and wine cellar
gated with 24-hour security video surveillance
24-hour chef and an International Butler Academy certified butler service on request

Villa Sea Princess Nika

Contemporary Villa with a nostalgia-provoking seaview Steeped in the aristocratic history and heirloom of the Čikat cove, the newly built villa is nonetheless nostalgia-provoking as are the facelift time-served gems along the opposite side of the cove

.Fashioned in the classical style, villa Nika has a more-is-more approach, both when it comes to decoration as well as the opulent stay in this luxurious island pied-à-terre.The regal arched facade and idyllic location of the villa nested in the pine forest, is what will leave carriage trade breathless at first glance

. The rustic French-house-inspired kitchen in white and chocolate melange marble is a mouthwatering road to the tavern, able to welcome up to fourteen people and plenty of wine bottles. Snug by the fireplace in the sit-outs of the living area, and accommodate a huge family dinner party at the ten-seater dining table. Self-pampering devotees will love the private spa and marble-dressed bathrooms

. Self-pampering devotees will love the private spa and marble-dressed bathrooms.The suites, tranquil sanctuaries, play hide-and-seek with the morning sun, while the outdoor area layered with terraces is enough to rival its stunning view over the cove of Čikat

. Dim the sunlight as you please by switching between pergola and gazebo shades, and be awed by the picture-perfect gourmet treats cooked by the private chef in the plein air kitchen.Villa Nika features:seven comfortable suits on three floors

elegant and stylish interiors featuring impressive marble and wooden surfaces
wine cellar Tavern featuring TV and suitable for conferences
private spa with steam and sauna rooms and private gym
exclusive home cinema
an outdoor pool and jacuzzi terrace with sun beds and patio umbrellas
outdoor dining and living area under the pergola overlooking Čikat Bay
professional outdoor kitchen with barbecue

professional outdoor kitchen with barbecue
gated with 24-hour security video surveillance
24-hour chef and an International Butler Academy certified butler service on request

Hotel Aurora

Unmatched location, in the middle of a hundred-year-old pine forest a few steps away from the sea, create an almost surreal setting. Nestled right above Veli Žal beach in Sunčana (Sunny) Bay, Hotel Aurora is a top choice for leisure travel or corporate events.A spacious conference hall welcomes 350 guests

.A spacious conference hall welcomes 350 guests. It is equipped with top of the line facilities suitable for all MICE (Meetings, Incentives, Conferences, Events) related activities. Room dividers create partitions adjustable for smaller event sizes.WHY CHOOSE Hotel Aurora:

indoor seawater pool
Aura Botanical Spa
spacious congress hall
various sports facilities
close proximity to beach
excellent animation programs

Enjoy Hotel Aurora’s unique Wellness Center Aura Botanical Spa. Here, you can choose between nine different ambience rooms or pamper yourself with relaxing body and facial treatments designed with locally-sourced and prepared essential oils.Our heated indoor and outdoor seawater pools and whirlpool baths complete the experience of total rejuvenation and relaxation

. For a more holistic experience, pick your pleasure between Finnish, Roman and Bio saunas, or saturate yourself in the invigorating sensation of a classic Turkish Bath.A bountiful buffet breakfast and dinner awaits in the hotel restaurant, where our experienced chefs create dishes before your eyes

. You can choose to savour your meals in the air-conditioned dining hall or take a seat on the large terrace with captivating views of the bay.Alongside the hotel, you’ll find a fitness centre and Family Aqua Fun pool complex - the perfect place for your children to revel in laughter from sunrise to sunset.

Family Hotel Vespera

Family Hotel Vespera is a playground of paradise for parents and children of all ages. Hotel Vespera is equipped with everything you’d ever wished for when planning your ideal family holiday. Located in Sunčana (Sunny) Bay within reach of a pebbled beach and flat surfaces for sunbathing, the town of Mali Lošinj is just 20 minutes away from Vespera by foot

.Hotel Vespera’s animation programs are catered for all age groups. With the help of our skilled educators and friendly animators, your children can expect carefree and fun-filled days. The evenings at Vespera are reserved for shows, mini discos and other entertaining activities perfect for the whole family

.While the younger children will enjoy the Pino Baby and Mini Club with educational board games, teenagers can anticipate the always popular Fussball, table tennis, darts and gaming consoles and many other sports activities. When you need care for those littlest ones, you can find comfort in our Mom's Corner, open 24 hours a day
. Here, you will find everything you need for your little one from a warm feed to the most attentive care of your baby.WHY CHOOSE FAMILY HOTEL VESPERA?around-the-clock animation programs for children

a tailored offer for families
the restaurant features a kid's buffet corner
Aqua Fun complex for families
playgrounds for children
family rooms
pediatric clinic nearby

Guests can choose to delight in two playgrounds or the Family Aqua Fun complex with outdoor pools on three cascading levels, all nearby the hotel. Every week, the hotel also organises a boat trip to the nearby Susak island. A sightseeing trip to Mali Lošinj by our hotel bus is another great way to spend a family-packed day

.Vespera’s Activity & Fun program is there to ensure that busy parents get some downtime without the little ones, too. Parents can join water aerobic sessions, take a chance at bocce ball (a type of bowling), stretch or join gym workouts.
